description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPoperation Ultra Companion – Companion plugin for WPoperation Themes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultra Companion – Companion plugin for WPoperation Themes: from n/a through 1.1.9.
